text.more:
The nodes show people (pink) and institutions (green)
The edges show the relations between people and institutions, such as work (purple), education (green) and association (orange).
text.intro:
This is a visualisation of the network of Guido Gezelle on Wikidata.
It represents people in relation to institutions related to work (purple), education (green and associations (orange).
It also shows job functions of these people. More info in long description.
text.title: Social cohesion of the network of the correspondents of Guido Gezelle on Wikidata
